title: 'I Found ﻿The ﻿Perfect Gift For All ﻿The Plant Moms And Green Thumbers In ﻿Your ﻿Life'
text:
Out with the crazy cat ladies and in with the crazy plant ladies. Being a proud plant parent is very much in, and I'm very much here for it (except I could use a little help with my bird's nest fern, tbh).



Whether your BFF is botany-obsessed or mom is already gearing up for spring gardening, odds are, you have at least one green thumber in your life. And when their windowsills are already stocked with succulents, choosing the perfect present for a plant lover can feel a little thorny.

But that's no reason to stop beleafin' (sorry, had to!). From practical products to help their botanical babies grow to cacti-covered clothing that's far more comfy than prickly, these 35 best gifts for plant lovers will definitely win you the position of Proud Plant Godparent. Congrats!
